content:
staff ReportDecember  

Around  p.m PERIOD Thursday suspects in a small blue car described to possible have a dent in the door attempted to lure a 10yearold girl into their car PERIOD



The attempted abduction took place in the  block of Jefferson Avenue one block east of Jefferson Elementary School PERIOD

According to the press release from the Charleston Police Department the suspects are described as a middle aged male in a black shirt and blue shorts and an uppermiddle aged white female wearing an orange long sleeve Tshirt and jeans PERIOD

Police Lt PERIOD Brad Oyer said the suspects were not acting violently PERIOD

They didnt try to take her by force they tried to persuade her into the car nonviolently Oyer said PERIOD She did exactly what she presumably been taught to do and didnt and left the area and everybody is ok.

Police will be monitoring the area and police in other local areas have been notified PERIOD

The safety of our children in this town is at the forefront of our priorities Oyer said PERIOD We are going to do everything we can to locate these people. if anyone has any information contact the Charleston Police Department at  or message the department through Facebook contact  or Coles County Crime Stoppers at  PERIOD
